mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 予約(予約ID, 会員番号, 本ID) VALUES (#{reservationId}, #{memberNumber.value}, #{bookId.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 予約.予約ID as "reservationId.value", 会員.会員番号 as "member.memberNumber.value", 会員.氏名 as "member.name.value", 会員.会員種別 as "member.memberType", 本.本ID as "reservedBook.book.bookId.value", 本.タイトル as "reservedBook.book.title.value", 本.著者 as "reservedBook.book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "reservedBook.book.bookType" FROM 予約 INNER JOIN 会員 on 予約.会員番号 = 会員.会員番号 INNER JOIN 本 on 予約.本ID = 本.本ID LEFT OUTER JOIN 予約取消 on 予約.予約ID = 予約取消.予約ID WHERE 予約取消.予約ID IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 予約取消(予約ID) VALUES (#{reservationId.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 予約.予約ID as "reservationId.value", 会員.会員番号 as "member.memberNumber.value", 会員.氏名 as "member.name.value", 会員.会員種別 as "member.memberType", 本.本ID as "reservedBook.book.bookId.value", 本.タイトル as "reservedBook.book.title.value", 本.著者 as "reservedBook.book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "reservedBook.book.bookType" FROM 予約 INNER JOIN 会員 on 予約.会員番号 = 会員.会員番号 INNER JOIN 本 on 予約.本ID = 本.本ID LEFT OUTER JOIN 予約取消 on 予約.予約ID = 予約取消.予約ID WHERE 会員.会員番号 = #{memberNumber.value} AND 予約取消.予約ID IS NULL
